summary: Disabled Ranged and Magic KillCams for Skyrim Update 1.6
descriptionHtml:
This mod disables [s]all[/s] [b]ranged and magic[/b] KillCams as of Skyrim Patch 1.6.

It does that by adding the constraint \"GetRandomPercent < 0.00\" (which is never true) to MagicOrBowCams, [s]MeleeCams and PairedKillTest (which is probably not used yet anyways)[/s].
[color=\"red\"][b]Turns out melee KillCams cannot be disabled that easily.[/b][/color]

It also sets these variables to 0:

Name (Original value)

fKillCamBaseOdds (1.0)
fKillCamLevelBias (0.01)
fKillCamLevelFactor (0.5)
fKillCamLevelMaxBias (0.1)
fKillCamLevelOffset (4)

This SHOULD disable every KillCam.

Feel free to edit or redistribute, wouldn\'t want to force KillCams on anyone...
author: ravenmast0r

files.name: Disable KillCams
files.changelogHtml:
Initial release.
Causes bugs with melee and stealth-melee KillCams.

files.name: Disable Ranged KillCams
files.changelogHtml: Disables only ranged and magic KillCams.
